column1: SDG 15.1 By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements
Definition: Percentage change in area under forest cover.
Source: HDRO calculations based on data on forest area from World Bank (2020a). World Development Indicators database. Washington, DC. http://data.worldbank.org. Accessed 22 July 2020.

column2: Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development
